title: Arthur Dupont
data: Arthur Dupont (born 1985) is a French actor. He was born in Saint-Mandé, Val-de-Marne, France. In 2006, he starred in Chacun sa nuit (One to another) directed by Jean Marc Barr, alongside Lizzie Brocheré and Karl E. Landler. In 2010, he received a nomination for the César Award for Most Promising Actor for his work on Bus Palladium. Since 2021, he plays a lead role in the TV series Les Petits Meurtres d'Agatha Christie. He has a son, born in 2021.[1] This article about a French film actor is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
